website_summaries.verdict: Warm, waterproof, yet breathable down jacket, with 4 color and trim combinations available.
pros: Jacket is lightweight and has 550 power fill down for comfort and warmth
Spyder's special Xt coating makes jacket waterproof while still breathable
Details include reverse coil center front zipper with custom spring-loaded pull, zippered hand-warming pockets, elasticized cuffs, and microfiber-lined neck and chin guard

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket! Just as good as much Canada goose. Got a medium and I am 5'10 weighing 168 and it is a nice snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, tapered jacket
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jacket, once I get outside for a few trips I will update. One cautionary note for a prospective buyer. I am 5'9" 155 Lbs, a solid Medium Regular in everything. This jacket is VERY form fitting. As others have noted if you are thick in the middle it will not work for you. It is snug around my hips and I am by no means fat.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I was really sad that I had to return this Jacket when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Man, I was really sad that I had to return this Jacket when I first got it. It was so comfortable, and loved the look, very stylish. Had to return because I ate too much over the holidays and It wouldn't fit my waist area when i try to zip it up. Not the product's fault that I need to hit the gym, hence the 5 star review still.
customer_reviews.author: Vash Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking and warm. BUT...if you have the slightest paunch, it’s going to be tight. Very very tight. However, like all Spyder gear, it’s very good looking. Quality materials all around as well. I have a 48 inch chest and a 36 inch waist. Not skinny by any means but pretty muscular up top. The XL fits... but barely. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, exactly as pictured.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exactly as pictured. My son who is 13 yrs old and 5' 10" tall and 145 lbs fit in a medium perfectly. It's light weight and fits a slim fleece underneath. In a cold climate it's not a jacket to wear on its own outside. It is more of an early fall/late winter to spring jacket unless you are wearing something under it. EG: this is definitely not a ski jacket. But it is authentic, really good looking, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LRRE

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small; order one size up.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing runs small; order one size up. I'm 5'9" 150lb 40" chest, and a large is a comfortable fit; snug enough that I wouldn't want to go down a size. Good enough insulation for 30s to 40s weather. I paid $75 during the recent sale, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anneoneamouse

customer_reviews.title: Good "reasonable  agreeable" slim fit...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the BEST deal for a nano down puffer on Amazon. The fit is fitted but not tooo slim The sleeves are correct on length, some of the other fitted Spyders and NF micro/ nano downs...the sleeves are too short. This has the right amount of pockets as well. Great price, the denier is tougher than Canada Goose Hybridge outer shell. It is sexy looking, drops 10lbs off your body, just on the look of the cut. Temperatures good down to about 25 degrees.. Anything colder, look to the layering up mode. .use this as a midlayer.. Take off the parka in. The car...walk this one in the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: After all I quite happy to have this good price
customer_reviews.text: I tried the S size in the store and it a little bit smaller. So I have to search on Amazon and likely found the M size. But when I receive it and it a little bit big to fit me. After all I quite happy to have this good price, fashion Down Jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cai

customer_reviews.title: Athletic fit, super nice, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few down jackets for different purposes and this one is certainly my favorite. It fits really well, but you'll need to be in good shape or this might be too tight in the torso. I have another down jacket that I tailored to fit me and this one fits almost as well, out of the box. Very high quality. Warm and very sporty, I will be wearing this for skiing next year and probably around town as well. I live in NorCal for climate reference.
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: or on windy cool nights.
customer_reviews.text: Warmer than it looks - I cannot wear this in the summer but warm and toasty in the spring and fall, or on windy cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: Admin P.

customer_reviews.title: SMAll is way too tight!!
customer_reviews.text: The small is way too tight around my rib cage and stomach and I don’t have a pot belly stomach. I’m not sure this jacket is made right. I’m contemplating whether or not to return it and go to all that trouble. I’m 145 lbs , height is 5/ 5.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Iz Here

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and warm
customer_reviews.text: After a few cold days in Utah I realized I needed something that had a bit more cold protection. Ordered this and it felt perfect. The style and cut is great. It is snug around the waist so if you happen to have a bit of a “dad bod” you may not find it all to comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: which normally fits me fine. Wearable but very tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large, which normally fits me fine. Wearable but very tight fitting. Seems a little on the thin side for 550 fill as well. Other than that, warm in non-extreme cold.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: You better be in good shape to wear these. They fit close to the body. Try a larger size if you are not sure. I had to return mine because it was too snug for my body. This garment has an ATHLETIC CUT. Be realistic about your body type. I usually wear an XL and this was way too tight. Too bad it was not available is a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny the Lion

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking jacket
customer_reviews.text: The coat runs small and did not fit. I am normally an XL. Nice looking jacket. Just runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is original item.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is a original jacket. Stitches are so bad that you can actually see fury stuff sticking out. Dust particles stick on to it like magnet and you will end up scrubbing it off endlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Robinhood

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fake!!!! If you want a fake Sounder jacket then buy this piece of crap!!! Oh yeah size and color wasn’t even shipped!!!! Good luck everyone!!! I don’t wear fake /bootleg products!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waistline check
customer_reviews.text: Good quality,great appearance, tailored fit. I advise as others to check your waistline. I am 5'6" 145lbs 29 inch waist and purchased a small. I prefer the snug fit as it helps to retain heat which is the sought after result. I would have given 5 stars if the fill was a touch higher than 550. I think it will be ok in the 20°'s but much more and due to the fit layering is limited.However, got it at a decent price so I am very pleased and would recommend just be sure of your waist size.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, high quality materials & skilled stitching. Warm & lightweight. Stylish & fits well. 6 ft tall & 205 lbs with 33" waist, no complaints. Snug enough to trap heat but loose enough to move freely. Bought stuff sack for suitcase. Recommended to all.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sexpack

customer_reviews.title: Super Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was a gift, the fit was perfect and Spyder is a terrific brand. The price was competitive with other retailers. Love Amazon wardrobe which gives you the option of trying on and returning or buying similiar to Stitch FIx or Trunk Club. You don't have a stylist but for a young man its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I wear it to ride motorcycle in the Florida winter ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear it to ride motorcycle in the Florida winter, It needs to be zipped up fully but it is my warmest riding jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Hairball

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is not an authentic Spyder jacket. The Spyder on the front and the name Spyder on the back are iron-on and not embroidered. I hope they don’t fall off. I want to return but my son LOVES the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside girl

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable jacket ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitting jacket I’ve ever owned. I’m always in between a medium and a large in almost every brand, and this fits perfectly. I kept a Patagonia jacket over this one last winter which I regret, and this winter I bought the Pelmo down with no regrets. I live near Chicago and this piece keeps me nice and warm. Hands down the best down jacket I’ve purchased in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice looking Coat.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking Coat. Very thin and light weight. The jacket is much thinner than I expected however, it fit perfect. As far as keeping me warm, that has yet been tested.
customer_reviews.author: Claro

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Like most have said, it runs really small. Exchanged it for larger size. The XL came in and it fit fine. It is small around the waist but that's my own fat problem. It is tailored for fit people. Super warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Fatheree

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and confortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with purchase, however, know that it runs snug. I ordered a medium and it is fitted. I am always a slim fit. If you usually get a size larger, you may want to consider that for this or get your usual size and and if you have Amazon Prime, you can send back if too small, shipping is so fast.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: If you buy Spyder order one size larger on this item.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, lightweight, down inner layer for skiing. I wear a large in every other Spyder piece of clothing. This piece I ordered in extra large due to all of the warnings written in the reviews. Extra large fits perfect. I would not have been able to put a large on. I’m 5’8”, stocky and weight 210. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kent S Gable

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Fits and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket has everything I was looking for: it looks stylish without making me look puffy or overweight, it's light, and keeps me warm. Note: this seems to be tapered slightly at the waist (which I like). If you have a bit of a belly, it may not be a good fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: jasonb007

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. This is a great fit for my size slim to athletic. Has great warmth, only wish it had a hood.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fit, super warm
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits so well and is great for keeping your body warm. The super smooth nylon slips on with great comfort and ease. Looks sexy and feels that way too! Look great when you go out in this fantastic, well made jacket.
customer_reviews.author: James Stoebe

customer_reviews.title: Tahoe bound
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a down jacket. I have been wearing it all season so far and it is comfortable and warm. One of my employees liked it so much, he ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: NMK

customer_reviews.title: Light and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Item as expected as is the fit. Light, warm and fashionable which is why I bought it. After 1 month of wearing, no lost feathers yet
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and very comfortable. Has been doing a great job of keeping me warm while in the arctic while not weighing a ton. It’s lighter than a hoodie!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small. Easily returned for larger size. Great jacket at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer 323323

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in waist
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a very nice jacket IF it fit as advertised. The arm length, neck, chest size is accurate, but the waist size is tight. A small is supposed to be 31-33 inches at the waist. It is not. I am a slender build and could barely get the jacket zipped closed. I would've ordered the next size up but it was almost 3 times the price, so can't attest to how a medium would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husbands favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite Christmas gift! Fits slimmer than his other jackets to the hips and has stitching to create a slim look. Good looking jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Stitching issue
customer_reviews.text: The small tab of material that you hang the jacket up with, the stitches came out 1st time. My wife fixed but not the quality I was hoping to see. Looks good, but beware if you have the slightest beer belly, I mean the slightest, very slim fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L

customer_reviews.title: Look at me Head Turner!
customer_reviews.text: Super Cool Jacket but very warm! Much warmer than you would think but it's a real head Turner! Zipper needs bigger teeth, it's kinda hard to start zipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a lighter jacket than it looks so don't expect to use in really cold temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and great fit light but keeps you warm
customer_reviews.author: David Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this jacket. We’ve bought quite a few of them. Watch the price, though. It fluctuates a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Light and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I am not giving 5 stars for comfort because it feels a little tight under armpits and short on the arms. I bought the medium size. I am 1,74 meters tall and regular size body. I’m afraid the large size will be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz V. Coimbra

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively Warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a smooth light weight jacket that offers plenty of warmth from the elements. It's somewhat fitted so the L fit me well I'm 42" Chest and 5'9" tall with a 30" waist.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tadros

customer_reviews.title: So sad that when I try to buy again the price was up.
customer_reviews.text: Is really nice jacket but tuns too small, I hate that in your pic of description of sizes you said that this jacket in size "s" the waist is 31 to 33 inches and is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Titanico79

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking jacket but it sheds down like crazy
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking but sheds TONS of down. Are they using pigeon feathers? They are small feathers.
customer_reviews.author: ts twain

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is soft and snuggly but the outer shell is made of a fragile material that tears easily with normal use, resulting in extrusion of its feathers. Sad that the outer shell isn't made of stronger fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: Coat was lighter gray with black Spyder logo. Picture seemed darker with the logo in white.
customer_reviews.author: John McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, light weight and really warm. You don't really to wear much beneath it to keep yourself warm. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: odai

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm good for ski and versatile cold weather gear. You will need a layer under if less than 25-30 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Joe.M NYC

customer_reviews.title: much better than my Columbia jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very warm jacket, much better than my Columbia jacket. A little puffy though.
customer_reviews.author: Mandeep Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT jacket for the right body type.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you order your normal size and consider yourself “non-chubby” this jacket is AWESOME! It’s form fitting and looks GREAT!! Seemingly good quality at similar price of other “average” jackets. This is a WIN!
customer_reviews.author: robert wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking jacket
customer_reviews.text: It is a great looking jacket. It is snug. Very form fitting. I would recommend this for weathers maybe in the 30s. Anything below I definitely layer up. Got some feather problems. Needs more pockets but overall I'm happy with it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so thin. Pulled it out of my backpack, tore a a hole in it. Must have been the plastic zipper on the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: mike timm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mid weight jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing. Not sure about the other bad reviews. I’ve owned several Spyder products and this one is one of my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ellender

customer_reviews.title: and it remains the best value I've gotten in a quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when it was on a special, and it remains the best value I've gotten in a quality jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket for any weather!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jacket to pack. Very lightweight, but also very warm at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: C. Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Very good jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. Very warm and way better than other spyder jackets. This one doesn’t leak feathers like the one I bought for myself (different style).
customer_reviews.author: Y.Kim

customer_reviews.title: I don't think its authentic spyder
customer_reviews.text: It is leaking feathers out of almost every stitch the stitch work is poor the thread is unraveling
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, stylish, made to withstand any weather.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, it’s lightweight, stylish, and most importantly it’ll withstand a frigid weather or a rainy day also I traveled to different cities and this jacket it’s my go to take on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Flomar

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: The look and fit is great. Definite value for an impromptu ski trip.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Wasta

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket, however these run small. I have Spyder sweaters and jackets and large always fit well, not for this jacket. I had to return and get the XL, which fit perfectly. Easy return.
customer_reviews.author: SR senior

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coat
customer_reviews.text: Received many compliments on this jacket. Warmth is very good and price cannot be beat as these coats are $249 everywhere else. Love the navy with red zipper
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Levack

customer_reviews.title: ORDER ONE SIZE UP!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BE adviced runs very small, order one size up , otherwise is very good quality and nice fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Pedros

customer_reviews.title: Do not wear inside a car
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the down keeps coming out the jacket
customer_reviews.author: luismarrero

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on Spyder
customer_reviews.text: Looks great especially for the price ($89 if available). Very snug fit in the stomach area as others have said so getting a size up may help if that is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JBinVa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; but it runs smaller than other spyder jackets
customer_reviews.author: Jorge G.

customer_reviews.title: Been washed a couple of times and still looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He loves it! Warm and fits really well on him. Been washed a couple of times and still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael FitzGerald

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Warm and nice looking, a little bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Orel

customer_reviews.title: Its a good jacket, but a very trim fit
customer_reviews.text: Its a good jacket, but a very trim fit. I mean very trim. I have a 31" waist and its a tight fit around by waist.
customer_reviews.author: Monetthecat

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP in Order
customer_reviews.text: Listen to everyone saying SIZE UP. I have 3 prior spyder jackets ALL size SMALL. I needed a medium. 5’8”, 160 lbs,. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it! I bought 2 more for my brothers
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It doesn't so much run small as it does fit perfectly. Don't fool yourself or be gratuitous on the size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good warm jacket looking good The bad some feathers Come ...
customer_reviews.text: Good warm jacket looking good The bad some feathers Come out
customer_reviews.author: shai press

customer_reviews.title: It is a very wonderful item.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very wonderful item. Delivery was also fast. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi Hakuta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and warm. It is a slim fitting jacket.
customer_reviews.author: John Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Run small  I'm a average men, I should choose my nex size
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the product, good enough to winter here in Chicago
customer_reviews.author: Edwin s.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Style , fit , comfortably and very good at keeping me warm and dry ! I'm very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Shaft77

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat. Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Coat ran a bit small so had to return for a larger size. No hassle. Awesome coat. Very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To small.!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit To short and To small; Great quality and warm.
customer_reviews.author: ESAU HERRERA

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, lightweight jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but does the job very well. Have received compliments from at least 5 people within 2 weeks after I started using this jacket :) Product is on the expensive side, but I purchased during an Amazon flash sale for $150.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: size up
customer_reviews.text: i regular wear small but this small was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Concha DMCCFI

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it look great on, but it keeps you incredibly warm, light weight and comfortable. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Slimming, warm, and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect for my husband! For reference he is 6'2", 200lb with 44" shoulders and 34" waist. It's fits like it's tailored to him. He also said it keeps him really warm! Was perfect for a trip to Vienna in 30 degree wether. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Spyder Pelmo Down Jacket
product_meta.description: Spyder's Pelmo Down Jacket is endlessly versatile-with 550 Fill Power Down, it's perfect to wear around town or under a shell for cold days on the mountain. Spyder is one of the largest winter sports brands in the world, as well as an Official Supplier to the U.S. Ski and Canadian Alpine Teams. Spyder apparel integrates high-technology fabrication, sport-specific function, and fashion conscious designs. Based in Boulder, CO, the company sells high performance sportswear in the United States, Canada, and more than 50 countries worldwide.
feature_bullets: Lightweight down proof polyester body fabric
